channel.title: How to run server off website?
channel.description: I need to know how to run my server on my website (like personal vps). I am using hostmonster.com, and cant figure ti out. I've uploaded the server files, by using an ftp client. But, i don't know how to run it. Please tell me where on my website to put it, and how to run it. Btw, I want it to run of the website only, not in any way on my computer. :D

item.title: How to run server off website?
item.dc:creator: @0Sneerz0 0Sneerz0
item.description:
@0Sneerz0 wrote:

So, you can’t run a server from your own site?

edit: Hostmonster has SSH, how do I use it?

Read full topic
item.source: How to run server off website?

item.title: How to run server off website?
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

You’re using a VPS? So you have root access, yes? Just run it from SSH. (a free windows ssh client is PuTTY, use the root user and pass to login (you should’ve been given it))

edit: hostmonster doesn’t even have VPS’s? You can’t run the server if you’re using shared hosting.

Read full topic
item.source: How to run server off website?

item.title: How to run server off website?
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

Open up server.java then add this method in

publicvoid runserveroffwebsite() {
If run() is executable setServer run()
}else{
Try{ RunServer.Bat // Starts the server from website
}
}
}
}

Add that and you will get it.
[center] All you’ve done is troll. Continue after this expires and it’ll be a permanent ban.[/center]

Read full topic
